Speaker: Speaker 3 (Teen - Ian)
Utterance: That's cool.

Speaker: Speaker 1 (Bettina Warburg)
Utterance: It's basically a network of computers that all have the same history of transactions.

Speaker: Speaker 1 (Bettina Warburg)

Speaker: Speaker 1 (Bettina Warburg)
Utterance: And basically that turns into the next part of the list, so it's sort of constantly updating itself.
